name: 洪克銘
objective:
本課程將從石油談起，介紹煉油工業主要產品、生產製程及技術，並將介紹供應石化產業基本原料的輕油裂解工場、媒組工場以及其衍生之烯烴與芳香烴工業。另將討論頁岩油氣開採對煉油與石化工業之影響，以及面對國際競爭態勢下之石化高值化之產業轉型問題。隨著環保意識高漲與氣候變遷議題引起之關注，石油工業發展面臨，環保、節能減碳、資源永續性發展等嚴峻挑戰也是本課程討論之目標。
Topics covered: 1. Characteristics of crude, petroleum product and its manufacture. 2. Processes technology in petroleum refining & petrochemical manufacture 3. Petrochemicals and its application 4. Overview of Taiwan petrochemical industry 5. Industrial safety, environmental concern, energy conservation and sustainability issue in regard to fossil fuel 6. High value added & rejuvenation of Taiwan petrochemical industry
schedule:
Course Syllabus
1. Introduction   (1st week)
2. Petroleum Refining & Petrochemical Industries 煉油與石化工業簡介  (2nd week)
3. Products & Basic principles for Petroleum Refining 石油產品與煉製原理  (3rd~4th weeks)
4. Refining Technologies：Fractionation、Hydrofining、Reforming、 FCC 、 RFCC、RDS and relates Processes 煉製技術  (5th~8th weeks).
5. Group Discussion (I) & Midterm 專題討論及期中測驗  (9th~10th weeks) 
6. Naphtha Cracking & Petrochemicals 輕油裂解與石化工業  (11th~13th weeks)
7. Shale Gas & Its impact to Refining & Petrochemical Industries 頁岩油氣對煉油與石化之衝擊  (14th week)
8. Energy Conservation & Environmental Issue 節能與永續之議題  (15th week)
9. Group Discussion (II) 專題討論(二)  (16th~17th weeks)
10.Final Exam 期末測驗  (18th week)
scorePolicy:
出席與學習態度 20%
Presentation & Report  40%
Final Exam  40%
